member.name: T:MindFusion.Scheduling.Export.PdfExporter
member.summary: Provides methods for exporting MindFusion calendars to PDF.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Export.PdfExporter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PdfExporter class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Export.PdfExporter.Export(MindFusion.Scheduling.WinForms.Calendar,System.String)
member.summary: Exports the specified calendar as a PDF format.
member.param: The name of the target file.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Export.PdfExporter.VisibleOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to export only the calendar area that is currently visible.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Export.PdfExporter.Margins
member.summary: Gets or sets the margins for the PDF pages, expressed as 100ths of an inch.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Export.PdfExporter.PageOrientation
member.summary: Gets or sets page orientation that is set to the resulting PDF pages.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Export.PdfExporter.PageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets PDF page size.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Export.PdfExporter.JpegImageEncoding
member.summary: Specifies whether images embedded in PDF should be encoded in Jpeg format.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Export.PdfExporter.JpegImageQuality
member.summary: Specifies the image quality of Jpeg images.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Export.PdfExporter.DefaultEncoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoding to use during export, or null, to automatically detect the encoding.
